items.sentence: If you showed me how to do that once more, I think I could do it.
The Grand Canyon is the number one tourist attraction in America.
Tom sings and plays the guitar at a local bar every Friday night.
Tom's attempt at a solution created more problems than it solved.
Do you think men talk about women more than women talk about men?
I know you're not going to come to my party, but I wish you were.
All commercial goods and packages from abroad go through customs.
Tom admired his father and wanted to be like him when he grew up.
Tom walks his dog for an hour a day, irrespective of the weather.
Tom was able to buy a gun, but he wasn't able to buy any bullets.
